thread.title: NTNU-forskere: – Oppdrettsnæringa er lakselussynder
thread.title_full: NTNU-forskere: – Oppdrettsnæringa er lakselussynder

posts.author: jenny@vol.no (Jenny Dahl Bakken )
posts.title: NTNU-forskere: – Oppdrettsnæringa er lakselussynder
posts.text:
Nå har forskere påvist at det er oppdrettsanleggene som er hovedkilden for spredning av lakselus. Oppdrettslaks i merd. Foto: NTB   07:41   07:44 E-post: 
Oppdrettsnæringa og villfiskere har i årevis krangla om hvor lakselusen kommer fra. Oppdrettsnæringa har hevdet at den hovedsakelig bæres av villfisk, og at dette er grunnen til at mange oppdrettslaks smittes med sykdommen igjen flere ganger, gjerne kort tid etter avlusing. 
Nå har NTNU-forskere i Ålesund funnet ut at det er feil, skriver Dagens Næringsliv . I stedet gir forskerne villfiskerfraksjonen en seier. Kommer fra oppdrett 
Konklusjonen deres er klar: oppdrettsanleggene er primærsmittekilde. 
De har undersøkt lakselus både hos vill fisk og oppdrettsfisk, og funnet ut at genvarianten som gjør lakselusen resistent mot lusemiddel, er like vanlig hos villfisk som oppdrettsfisk i områder med mye oppdrett. Oppgraderer Sommarøy produksjonslag:

thread.title: Crush of tough issues could bring about government shutdown
thread.title_full: Crush of tough issues could bring about government shutdown

posts.title: Crush of tough issues could bring about government shutdown
posts.text:
Crush of tough issues could bring about government shutdown Posted: Updated: (AP Photo/J. Scott Applewhite). Members of the tax-writing House Ways and Means Committee work to shape the GOP's far-reaching tax overhaul, on Capitol Hill in Washington, Monday, Nov. 6, 2017. 
By ANDREW TAYLORAssociated Press 
WASHINGTON (AP) - As Republicans focus on overhauling the tax code, the rest of Washington's fall agenda seems to be adrift, raising the real possibility of a government shutdown in December. 
A divided Congress is struggling to agree on military and domestic spending and help for young immigrants, among other issues. And President Donald Trump's penchant for shifting his positions isn't helping. 
The agenda outside tax reform is a combustible mix of must-do and could-do items, with the current government spending bill set to expire Dec. 8. On the list are immigration and a U.S.-Mexico border wall; an impasse over children's health care; pent-up demand for budget increases for the Pentagon and domestic agencies; and tens of billions of dollars in hurricane aid. 
There's plenty at stake for Republicans controlling Washington. Politically, there's an urgency to avoid a debilitating shutdown just as the GOP hopes to wrap up an overhaul of the tax code that is its top priority. And legions of GOP defense hawks are adamant that the Pentagon receive a huge 2018 budget hike approaching $80-90 billion. Trump and many followers want the U.S.-Mexico wall. 
Democrats retain considerable power in the endgame - their votes are needed - and are pressing demands of their own. They want protections for immigrants who were brought to the U.S. illegally as young children. They also demand budget increases for domestic agencies. 
"I think we're headed in a good direction on the spending caps," Sen. Roy Blunt, R-Mo., said Monday. "I don't know that will get to immigration this year but that's a pretty easy thing to settle if the Democrats will give the president some of what he wants. I think he would be willing to be pretty forward-leaning on kids who were brought to the country illegally." 
"Can you get a bipartisan Dream Act? Can you marry it up with border security and interior enforcement?" said Sen. Lindsey Graham, R-S.C. "There's a potential deal." 
For his part, Trump tends to waver depending on the situation - siding with Democrats on a debt deal in September, and promising Republicans last week that the controversial immigration issue won't be part of the year-end spending measure. 
Meanwhile, the tax debate is taking up energy, time and political capital, and GOP leaders seem reluctant to issue controversial decisions that might harm its chances. 
A rundown of non-tax issues facing Congress and Trump: 
___ 
SPENDING 
Ideally, top leaders in both parties would like to agree on new spending levels and pass a catchall bill by the Dec. 8 deadline. That's looking increasingly unlikely. Another temporary funding bill would be needed to avert a government shutdown, but many Democrats say they won't be able to support any measure that doesn't include help for so-called "Dreamer" immigrants facing deportation. That increases the odds of a shutdown. 
Congressional leaders are conducting secret talks on raising the spending levels and say they are optimistic about a deal. But there's no sign of one yet. A possible agreement could add perhaps $100 billion to the budget for the current year alone, which is sure to cause sticker shock among the GOP's fiscal conservatives. Trump's demands for the border wall - a nonstarter with Democrats - could spark a shutdown battle. 
Then there's aid to areas devastated by Hurricanes Harvey, Irma and Maria. The White House promises to submit a request later this month for "several tens of billions of dollars" aimed mostly at helping Texas and Florida. That's likely to bring the total appropriated since September for hurricane relief to more than $100 billion, which is likely to rankle deficit hawks. 
___ 
IMMIGRATION 
Trump announced in September that he is ending temporary deportation protections granted by the Obama administration to young immigrants known as "Dreamers" who were illegally brought into the U.S. and often have known no other home. But he gave Congress until March to come up with a fix and promised top Democratic leaders he would sign legislation protecting them, so long as he wins billions for border security. 
The Congressional Hispanic Caucus and Senate Democrats, such as California Sen. Kamala Harris, are demanding the immigration issue be addressed as soon as possible and won't vote for any spending bill that fails to include a solution. That could doom the spending bill as Republicans need Democratic votes to pass the measure. Top Democrats such as Minority Leader Chuck Schumer of New York are keeping their powder dry in hopes that negotiations, which appear stalled, pick up steam. 
___ 
CHILDREN'S HEALTH 
The reauthorization of an expired children's health program is becoming more urgent as the lapse in the program will mean a cutoff in services in Arizona, California, Minnesota, Ohio and other states by late December or January. 
There's a bipartisan desire to extend the program, but negotiations over how to pay for the measure have yet to produce a breakthrough. A compromise ultimately appears likely, and the measure is a candidate to be coupled with other items in December.

posts.text: Em jogo que acontece neste sábado (11), no estádio Moura Filho na cidade de Alagoinha, a  equipe do Tabajara Atlético Clube da cidade de Alagoa Grande estará enfrentando a  Seleção de Jacaré na  primeira partida das oitavas de final da Copa Cultura de futebol amador. A Copa Cultura de futebol amador é  organizada pela equipe de esportes da Rádio Cultura de Guarabira, e  reúne equipes que representam dezenas de cidades das mais variadas regiões do estado da Paraíba. Torcedor vá ao campo e prestigie o Tabajara na luta para conquista de mais um título para o futebol alagoagrandense!!!

Hola precios@s! 

Hoy dejo los potingues a un lado para hablaros de otro de mis vicios y son las series! Parece que acaba el verano y ya pensamos en ese  momento sofá-manta y empezamos a organizar que series nos vamos este invierno. Y así es... 


  Clique Serie de HBO. Va de dos amigas de la infancia que van a la univesidad e Edinburgo. Georgia ingresa en un grupo exclusivo de alumnas dirigidas por la profesora a la Holly Admira. Las integrantes del grupo son tan atractivas como inteligentes pero Georgia se comporta cada vez de una manera más extraña y Holly se ve obligada a integrar en el grupo para ayudarla. Se descubre un mundo de fiestas, lujos, vicios y negocios turbios. Con muchos secretos a los que Holly se esfuerza en sacar a la luz.  

La serie es muy cortita pero súper intrigante. Os la recomiendo totalmente.  


The Handmaid's Tale  Serie de HBO. Basada en el best-seller de margaret Atwood. Los desastres medioambientales y la baja tasa de natalidad provocan que Gilead gobierne un régimen fundamentalista que considera que las mujeres son propiedad del estado. Las últimas mujeres fértiles son forzadas como esclavas sexuales para llevar a cabo un intento de repoblar el mundo.  
Ya la historia pone un poco los pelos de punta pero es que los personajes son realmente increíbles. La protagonista lucha realmente por sobrevivir y por recuperar a su hija arrebatada de sus brazos.  

13 Razones  Netflix.  Clay Jensen encuentra en la entrada de su casa una caja de zapatos repleta de cintas de cassete grabadas por su compañera de clase Hannah Baker alumna que se suicidó y dejo en las cintas las 13 personas que marcaron su decisión.   
Sé que llego tarde para esta serie, que ya pasó su boom. Y sinceramente me decepcionó un poco. Supongo que al darle tanto bombo ya creas unas expectativas sobre ella y... fue menos de lo esperado. 
La serie te mantiene en intriga durante todos los capítulos pero hay algunos personajes que me parecen un poco de "paja" para llegar a los 13.  Jane The Virgin  Netflix. En un examen médico ginecológico Jane resulta inseminada artificialmente por error. Jane es virgen y muy religiosa. Estaba esperando a casarse con su novio para perder la virginidad. Repentinamente su vida da un giro y se vuelve como una telenovela. 
La culpa de que me enganchara a esta serie la tiene 2 amigas. Me dijeron "no esperes la gran serie pero te vas a partir de risa" y así es!!. Serie para chicas, se burla del estilo telenovelas constantemente. Echaba mucho menos una serie para chicas (Sexo en Nueva York dejó un gran vacío en mi).  


Y no podía faltar.... 
Stranger Things 2 
Ha pasado un año desde que Will ahora apodado niño zombie desapareciera pero nada ha vuelto a la normalidad... 
Bueno... a mi esta serie me tiene sin palabras. Me encanta ya no solo la historia que también! es el cómo esta hecha, como esta ambientada...  es perfecta!! 

¿Qué me decís? Acabo de empezar Girlboss que también pinta muy bien, ya os haré reseña por aquí ya que de momento me esta gustando bastante. Me encantaría que me recomendarais alguna serie porfi porfi  :D

posts.title: Timing of Antelope Canyon visit in November - Page
posts.text: We are heading to Page in a few weeks and thinking of visiting upper and lower AC on different days. I recognize there will be no sunbeam action in November. But I'm trying to shuffle timing as we will arrive one day in the afternoon and likely tour upper or lower that day and then visit the other the following morning/mid day. So, any recommendation as to which order to book? Many thanks, Bill
